briefTitle: Improving Insulin Therapy With Enhanced Care Management

armGroups.label: Reciprocal Diabetes Peer Support program
interventionNames: Behavioral: Reciprocal Diabetes Peer Support Program

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* type 2 diabetes
* HbA1c \> 7%
* age \> 21

Exclusion Criteria:

* substance abuse disorder
* serious psychiatric illness
* serious hearing loss
* life expectancy \< 12 months

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Glycemic Control (HbA1c)
outcomeMeasures.description: The primary outcome was change between baseline and six-month Hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c), measured with a Bayer DCA 2000+ point-of-care analyzer.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Systolic Blood Pressure Measure
outcomeMeasures.description: secondary outcome measure was change in blood pressure comparison of peer support group and nurse case management group from baseline to six months

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Diastolic Blood Pressure
outcomeMeasures.description: change in diastolic blood pressure was measured at 6 months

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Insulin Starts at 6 Months
outcomeMeasures.description: the number of insulin starts at 6 months from baseline.
